subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong will race against his longtime teammate George Hincapie in the Tour Down Under around Adelaide in January. Armstrong is coming out of retirement and returning to professional cycling in the South Australian race.
snippet: Lance Armstrong will race against his longtime teammate George Hincapie in the Tour Down Under around Adelaide in January. Armstrong is coming out of retirement and returning to professional cycling in the South Australian race.
